value:
$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The Tempest... That is the name
given to this vortex of chaos. I call
upon you, great Heroes...$k$p$WmMPID_温泉リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Spa19,Face|Yes?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Please...lend your strength to...to...$k$p$WmMPID_温泉カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Spa19,Face|Cat got your tongue?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I have fought alongside Heroes from
many realms and many ages... And
yet...$k$pThis...is new.$k$p$WmMPID_温泉ヒノカ,ch05_26_Hinoka_F_Spa19,Face|Don't blame us! You decided to
summon us while we were wrapped
in towels.$k$p$WmMPID_温泉エリーゼ,ch05_25_Elise_F_Spa19,Face|It's not even strange! We often visit
the hot springs between battles...$k$p$WmMPID_温泉サクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_Spa19,Face|This... This is n-normal. I'm not
embarrassed! I'm not...$k$p$WmMPID_温泉リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Spa19,Face|Worry not, Prince Marth. I am ready
to fight. A samurai must always be
ready, no matter where or when.$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|I understand. And I believe in you—
all of you. Let's head out...before
you catch cold.$k$p

$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|The Tempest fades. I thank you for
your bravery, Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_温泉ヒノカ,ch05_26_Hinoka_F_Spa19,Face|We have claimed victory...somehow.
The Tempest was strange, wasn't it?
We visited so many springs...$k$p$WmMPID_温泉カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Spa19,Face|Good thing we were dressed for the
occasion. We're soaked!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|That's true... I'm wet through.$k$pAchoo! I need to change... I suppose I
had better leave.$k$p$WmMPID_温泉リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Spa19,Face|Why not join me in the bath, Prince?$k$pCorrin's spring warms the body and
soothes the mind. Have you had the
chance to bathe this way?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Ah, er... I...$k$pWell, some time ago I visited a spring
in another world. I even tried on a
yukata...$k$p$WmMPID_温泉リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Spa19,Face|Ah! We have yukata in Hoshido. You
can tell me all about your experience
while we soak.$k$pThe camaraderie shared by warriors
as they bathe naked together—it is
quite something, my prince!$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Er, yes... But... You see... I can't... Er,
because...$k$p$WmMPID_温泉カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Spa19,Face|Perhaps the women's bath would
befit you?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Er, no... I... Because, well...$k$pEr... I'll see you all another time,
honorable, towel-clad Heroes!$k$p$WmMPID_温泉リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_Spa19,Face|What a reserved character, that
prince. He left in quite a rush.$k$p$WmMPID_温泉カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Spa19,Face|Adorable! Hee-hee.$k$p
